newsitem.title: USA: U.S. spot jet prices jump, but diffs ease slightly.
newsitem.headline: U.S. spot jet prices jump, but diffs ease slightly.

text.p: U.S. spot jet fuel prices firmed by late Wednesday as the sharp jump on the NYMEX outpaced a modest dip in the differentials.
On the NYMEX, July heating oil rallied 1.42 cents to end at 52.99 cents a gallon and August heating oil jumped 1.31 cents to finish at 53.17 cents.
Prompt U.S. Gulf 54-grade jet fuel was talked between about 0.10 and 0.25 cent over the July NYMEX, down about 0.25 cent on the day.
New York Harbor 54-grade fuel differentials also eased lower, with prompt barrels seen offered at 1.65 cents over the July futures.
